column1: eDe ENTREPRISES POUR L'ENVIRONNEMENT (EpE) A French organization bringing together 50 large French and international companies committed to better integrating environmental stakes into their strategic decisions and daily management.
column3: ISO ISO 14001 International standard for the analysis and control of local environmental risks.
column4: ISO ISO 9001 & IATF 16949 International standard for quality management systems in the automotive industry.
